english.segment1: While shutters enclose, The boundaries of my heart, I hold my breath, Till the steady beating is shut out.
english.segment2: In silence I wait for what is real, For I know the truth of my perceptions, Nothing in life matters more, more than you, Matters more, more than you
english.segment3: When first feelings fade, I will still be here.
